tt:div.tt:p:
GILLETTE: Not once, not ever
has he volunteered for a

dangerous mission,
and now all of a sudden he's
like "Let me go"? !

On a night jump in the
freezin-ass cold to kill a
Finnish double agent?

So I'm like "Yeah,
let Archer go!"

But she's like "Ray, it's your
mission and that's final!"

Cause just between us gals
and the C-130,

I think she used to screw, ick,
Nikolai Jakov,
the head of the KGB!

And I think Archer wanted this
mission so he could cross into

Russia cause he thinks Jakov
might be his father!

And y'all know me,
I'm no gossip,

but that's some scandalous-ass
shit right there...

ARCHER: Ray? If it's any
consolation, you were right.

Oh, and try not to be
unconscious too long.

Just tell my mother I pulled
a gun on you, all right.

O.K. Got my fake documents,
plenty of cash,

so the crossing should be a
breeze.

Drive to Saint Pete,
grab a latte,
then 400 miles to Moscow...

Putting me there right about the
time Nikolai Jakov,

head of the KGB,
comes home for his borscht,

only to find an unexpected
dinner guest.

And for dessert,
we will have the truth.

After a lifetime of your
secrets and lies,
we will finally have the truth!

And also hopefully
shitloads of vodka.

PILOT: Chief, why's the door
still -- wait, don't tell me he
just now jumped!

PILOT: You know he missed the
drop zone by like, eight miles.

I was uh, asking if this was the
Finnish Skydiving Club.

Which, judging by your response,
I assume it is not.

That's a broken zygomatic bone,
plus I was unconscious for an
hour!

GILLETTE: Which is super bad
for you!

LANA: Super bad,
have you seen a neurologist?

MALORY: Well unless it's in
Russia you'd just better cancel
it!

GILLETTE: Well it's obviously
not, and what?

MALORY: The mission you failed
was right on the border and I

think Sterling might be trying
to cross into Russia!

oh, is this about
Nikolai Jakov,
the head of the KGB?

The man you've been having a
forty-year affair with?

MALORY: What are you
talking about? !

And even if I did know
what you're talking about,

how do you know what you're
talking ab -- Paaaam!

MALORY: Get your bloated carcass
in here!

Have you been going through my
desk? !

PAM: Okay A, nobody cares
about your big knobbly
vibrating eggplant!

PAM: B, sometimes I work late,
and C, there's this new thing

the kids are doin,
called shuttin the damn door!

Foaty ounce in my lap,
and it's freezin my jernk...

MALORY: Then I put whipped cream
all over everything...

And then you know where this
goes...

CYRIL: You guys talking about
the Whipped Cream Incident?

MALORY: Wh-? Does everyone
know about it? !

really just the, ya know,
core group.

MALORY: Pam, I should have you
flensed, and what in God's name
do you people want?

CYRIL: And SIGINT said to give
this to you.

Radio chatter about an American
agent the KGB caught parachuting
into Russia?

MALORY: Probably hanging by his
Achilles tendons in some KGB
hellhole!

Caught at border,
taken to Vyborg...?!

Ray, get your purse
and take some Midol,
you're going back for him!

GILLETTE: Mmm, according to
these notes from my doctor,

a radiologist,
and my new neurologist,
I'm doing no such thing.

MALORY: Start at the KGB field
office in Vyborg,

if he's not being held there
go to Saint Petersburg,

and if he's not there,
you go straight to Moscow!

LANA: As what,
Russia's only black woman?

I can't have this getting
blabbed all over the agency,

but... oh God,
someone has to go rescue my son!

Before he talks
to Nikolai Jakov!

LANA: Well that someone needs
to be fluent in Russian,

a few contacts in the KGB
wouldn't hurt...

could, um, this someone
be from outside the agency?

MALORY: Oh, now I know you two
have had your little differences
in the past, but --

You remeber he shattered
my femur!

Which is why I'm in New York,
by the way,
I need all new pins put in it!

MALORY: And I'm sure
that must be --

BARRY: Oh! And he sodomized
my fiancée!

MALORY: Well, then
it wasn't meant to be.

BARRY: I -- I don't even know
how to respond to that.

MALORY: What is meant to be is
your going to Russia to bring

back my son before he does any
damage.

MALORY: Well, if you can
divide that by four.

BARRY: Wh-? C'mon,
this is your son's life!

Fifty now, two hundred
when you bring him back.

BARRY: I'll do it on one
condition.

LANA: I am not having sex
with Barry!

MALORY: And you were about to,
when you thought it would get
you my job!

MALORY: His life may very well
depend on it.

LANA: But he's such a
douchebag...

Well, also very much Archer,
but I'm talking about Barry!

BARRY: Who is, in fact,
sitting right here.

So you wanna do it on the desk,
or... hallway,
where you wanna knock this out?
BARRY: Oh no no no. Before.

BARRY: Then can I bring you back
anything from Moscow?

Maybe some nesting dolls
of my penis?

BARRY: According to ODIN's guy
in the KGB.

Which, as a real agency,
we have.

MALORY: We've got guys in the
KGB too, smarty!

MALORY: Well don't just
stand here,

Sterling's probably being
tortured as we speak!

BARRY: Don't worry,
he's a high-value asset.

I'm sure they're treating him
just fine...

Kinda wishing I'd taken
my training more seriously
right about now...
Which is uh, pretty rare for me.

ARCHER: I swear I'm just a
Finnish skydiving enthusiast

who shit
why am I speaking English? !

KGB AGENT: Mebbe becuz
you are Sterlink Archer?

ARCHER: Who? No,
you know what I bet happened,

is all the shocks damaged
my frontal lobe.

Okay, we wait some test on you,
so now I tek a kuffee brek.

ARCHER: None for me,
have a nice break.
I drup kids off et pool.
Oh my God, Barry, I got --

Your mother is paying me to
rescue you.

ARCHER: What am I smelling,
Barry.

ARCHER: Um, okay. Until then,
do you have some sort of escape
plan, or...?

BARRY: I thought maybe I'd shoot
you in the face and smuggle
you out in a coffin.

ARCHER: Or something a little
less sarcastic?

BARRY: always hide
in plain sight.

Unless you've got
a better idea...

ARCHER: I -- I might, maybe,
depends on him.

BARRY: Nikolai Jakov,
the head of the KGB?

ARCHER: Yes, Barry,
and if you tell anybody
I will murder you.

Now shut up while I go confront
my putative father...

ARCHER: While he's in
such a good mood.

JAKOV: I know you heff been
sleepink with thet,
thet mudak Len Trexler!

MALORY: Oh, like you're
Mister Monogamous!

Do you know your son is here,
in the cells of the dreaded
Lubyanka? !

JAKOV: End thet I am now
awaitink results of DNA test
to esteblish peternity? !

ARCHER: I thought they just
wanted my hair so their

scientists could unlock the
secret of its luxuriant
fullness...

BARRY: Uh, no, it's not that
thick back here.

JAKOV: End if he is nut my
biologik son...!

I will put personally a bullet
in his bren.

JAKOV: So! Whut do you think
are his udds? !

ARCHER: Yeah no,
I do not like those udds.
So what was your plan again?

I think I remember thinking it
was good...

Oh my God,
he's going to kill him!

CHERYL/CAROL: Wow, so this
is pretty serious, huh?

LANA: Well, Archer's being
tortured with two-to-one odds

he ends up brutally murdered,
so yes,
I'd say it's pretty serious!

PAM: Were you talking about
we're out of rubber cement?
LANA: What is wrong with you? !

CHERYL/CAROL: Bitch I got ants
all over me!

PAM: Who cares about yer glue
withdrawal? !

Jeez, what if Mr. Archer
gets killed? !

CYRIL: Yeah right,
my luck's not that good...

ARCHER: We're hiding in plain
sight, alright...

what'd we get, Barry,
like six blocks?

BARRY: Roll the God damn
window down!

You know how bad that is for
your eardrums? !
BARRY: I'm sorry, what was that?

ARCHER: I said
how's your ex-fiancée.

BARRY: How is she, I don't know
You tell me!

ARCHER: Well gee, Barry,
what's French for
"deliciously depraved"? !

BARRY: How 'bout you ask
your mom? !

ARCHER: What's that supposed
to mean? !

It means best-case scenario
you have no frickin idea

who your father is,
and worst-case,
he's head of the KGB!
Well at least I have a father!

BARRY: Are you implying
my mother gave virgin birth,
or...?

Actually I dunno what
I was implying, I just said it.

But I think we may have a
problem.
ARCHER: So I can go past you!

BARRY: Has anybody ever told you
that you are profoundly
self-centered? !

MALORY: No! Nikolai please,
do something!

JAKOV: Kroshka, he kill
two military police.

So even if he wuz my biologik
son --

BORIS: Who do Archer
think he is?
The unly guy who want a fodder?
Out! Get out, you idiot man!

Even if he is my son,
it is too let.
ARCHER: You could help, ya know!

BARRY: Yeah so now,
what are we doing?

ARCHER: Running for our lives,
Barry, I thought that was fairly
obvious.

ARCHER: Um, unless you wanna
stay here.

RUSSIAN OFFICER: Who tut you
women how to shoot? !

BARRY: It's just I'm not
super-big on heights --

BARRY: Ever since you threw me
off a balcony!

ARCHER: First of all,
I didn't throw you off anything!

BARRY: After I begged you
not to!

ARCHER: After I begged you not
to rip my suit!
BARRY: I was clinging for life!

ARCHER: Yeah, to the silk-lined
sleeve of a bespoke
Savile Row suit jacket!

ARCHER: Oh, oh! And a bespoke
Turnbull & Asser shirt,
which you also ruined!

Well how would you phrase the
fact that you crippled me both
physically and emotionally? !
That way's not looking too good.
ARCHER: You got a better idea? !

This is why I didn't
wanna do this.

Looks like the whole
"find out who my father is"

thing isn't happening,
and so now I just wanna
get outta here...

So I'm thinking maybe
we oughta split up.

BARRY: No! Archer your boots
are slipping!

ARCHER: Probably because there's
two hundred pounds of asshole
hanging off 'em!

BARRY: Wh-? ! One eighty three,
fatboy!

ARCHER: Whatever,
tell that to my silk socks.

BARRY: Why are you wearing
silk socks? !

ARCHER: Barry buddy,
this is happening.

ARCHER: So try to aim
for that dumpster.

Oh for -- why don't you just go
to my house and take all my
clothes? !

ARCHER: Seriously, these
people can't hit anything...

ARCHER: What is this,
a broken glass factory?
Those cannot be your only shoes.

What am I saying, it's Russia,
people probably come from miles

around just to have their
picture taken in those.

ARCHER: Piece of -- how are you
a superpower? !

But I'm giving you this coat,
so -- Hi, how ya doin,
Sterling Archer.

Sorry I can't stay for dinner,
I assume that smell is cabbage
and not just you two.

RUSSIAN OFFICER: Shut up,
you're under arrest.

ARCHER: Don't even think I want
Jakov to be my father.

Who would break in to this
shithole? !

ARCHER: Which is apparently
a soldier factory!
You dunt look so dangerous now.

ARCHER: You think it's because
I'm in loafers?

Works with a turtleneck,
obviously, but --

and I'm seeing this more
and more -- I really like 'em
with a casual suit.
Loafers and a suit, yay or nay?

Ow ow! Use your imaginations
make a soccer ball
out of a dead cat!

ARCHER: Did I just blow
your minds.

What, you hear machine guns
and decide now's a good time
to take out the --

Get a welder to cut
the top off that, and bing:
new umbrella stand. Huh?

Hate to do it to you,
but I'm commandeering your
vodka. We square?
Ow ow ow ow ow ow ow ow ow!

Really rethinking that tetanus
booster right about now...

Rethinking a lot of things,
actually...

Although I do have three pounds
of glass in my feet, so --
This is how game ends for you.

RUSSIAN OFFICER 2: We will send
flowers.

JAKOV: There was nuthink
I could do...

JAKOV: The doctors say thet even
if he did nut already hef pins
in thet leg --

JAKOV: They could nut hef
saved it.

BARRY: Oh for -- Jesus,
did you even try? !
DOCTOR: I em sorry, Mr. Archer.

Sterling doesn't have any pins
in his leg!

JAKOV: I dunt - then if that
is not Sterlink, where is he?

ARCHER: I am! If you'd
hang on a damn minute!

RUSSIAN OFFICER 2: Come on,
we dunt hef all night.

ARCHER: Yeah right,
like you've got plans.

KATYA: Do you not wonder how it
is that I know your name?

ARCHER: Well, I assume I'm
pretty famous here, so --
ARCHER: Oh. Oh! But then why --

KATYA: Because I want to help
you escape, Sterling Archer!

But only if you will promise me
one thing!

Super glad I didn't
wet my pants.
